items.sentence: Tom, Mary and John each took a drink of beer.
Tom wasn't the person who convinced me to go.
Tom says that he wants a puppy for Christmas.
I sometimes check out books from the library.
You're amused by what's going on, aren't you?
I suspect Tom has to go to Boston next month.
I suspect Tom has never done that by himself.
I suspect Tom has agreed to do that for Mary.
I suspect Tom didn't really need to be there.
I suspect Tom can't understand French at all.
